categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: "Countdown" was an Imperial TIE/sk x1 experimental air superiority fighter pilot during the Galactic Civil War. He had short brown hair and light-colored skin. "Countdown" was stationed on Scarif during the battle near the Citadel Tower, where they entered a dogfight with an T-65B X-wing starfighter.
